sources.title: Disorder In The Court (1936) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: Disorder In The Court is a 1936 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: Disorder in the Court (1936)
sources.description: The Stooges are key witnesses at a murder trial. Their friend Gail Tempest,  who dances at the Black Bottom cafe where the Stooges are musicians, is accused of killing Kirk Robin. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/disorder-in-the-court-1936/

sources.title: Disorder in the Court
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

metadata.Plot: The stooges are witnesses at a trial where their friend, a dancer at a nightclub where they are musicians, is accused of murder. The stooges manage to disrupt the proceedings but save the day when they discover the real murderer's identity.
metadata.Actors: Moe Howard, Larry Fine, Curly Howard
